name: raam
description: The mobile application accessibility assessment framework was developed to serve as a basis for assessment and implementation for all public sector bodies covered by the [Luxembourg law of 28 May 2019](http://legilux.public.lu/eli/etat/leg/loi/2019/05/28/a373/jo).

scripts.build: node scripts/generate-criteria.js && node scripts/generate-glossary.js && node scripts/generate-methodologies.js

author: SIP
